statements: SELECT * FROM return_data;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_value FROM return_data ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_value FROM return_data WHERE return_reason = 'Damaged';
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_value FROM return_data WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY return_value ASC;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_value FROM return_data WHERE return_value > 100 AND return_reason ILIKE '%defective%' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_value FROM return_data WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_value FROM return_data WHERE return_value > 1000 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_value FROM return_data WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%' ORDER BY return_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(return_value) AS average_return_value FROM return_data;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_value FROM return_data WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ReturnData
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM ReturnData
SELECT return_reason, return_date, product_name FROM ReturnData
SELECT return_id, product_name, return_reason FROM ReturnData WHERE return_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT opportunity_id, recovery_type, recovery_value FROM RecoveryOpportunities
SELECT * FROM ReturnData WHERE return_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM ReturnData WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RecoveryOpportunities WHERE recovery_type = 'Refund' ORDER BY recovery_value DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_date, recovery_type, recovery_value FROM ReturnData JOIN RecoveryOpportunities ON ReturnData.return_id = RecoveryOpportunities.return_id;
SELECT return_id, product_name, return_reason FROM ReturnData WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damaged%' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ShippingReturns;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM ShippingReturns;
SELECT item_name, original_price, resale_price FROM ResaleItems;
SELECT material_name, recyclability, recycling_method FROM RecyclingMaterials;
SELECT return_reason, return_status FROM ShippingReturns;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason, return_status FROM ShippingReturns;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_condition, original_price, resale_price FROM ResaleItems;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, recyclability FROM RecyclingMaterials WHERE recyclability = 'High';
SELECT item_name, item_condition, original_price FROM ResaleItems WHERE original_price > 100 AND item_condition = 'New';
SELECT * FROM returns;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products;
SELECT resale_date, resale_price, return_id, product_id FROM resales;
SELECT product_id, recycling_date, recycling_process FROM recyclings;
SELECT return_date, product_id, return_reason FROM returns;
SELECT * FROM returns
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT return_id, return_date, product_id, return_reason FROM returns WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT r.product_id, p.product_name, r.resale_price FROM resales r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products
SELECT * FROM return_data;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_reason FROM return_data WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01' AND return_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendor ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, product_id, feedback_text FROM recycling_feedback WHERE recycling_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM return_data WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT opportunity_id, initial_price, resale_price FROM resale_opportunities WHERE resale_price > 1000;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendor ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, product_id, feedback_text FROM recycling_feedback WHERE recycling_status = TRUE;
